item.title: Realme 10 Series Specifications Surface Again, Tipped to Launch in November
item.description: Realme 10 Series Specifications Surface Again, Tipped to Launch in November The TENAA listings of the Realme 10 5G and Realme 10 Pro+ 5G have been updated to reveal the specifications of the two smartphones.

item.title: Apple's App Store Said to Start Displaying More Ads From Today: Report
item.description: Apple’s App Store Said to Start Displaying More Ads From Today: Report While ads were previously visible in the App Store, the new ads appearing in the Today tab, will allow better visibility for advertisers, according to a report.

item.title: Redmi Note 12 Pro+ 5G camera specifications confirmed ahead of launch
item.description: Redmi Note 12 Pro+ 5G camera specifications confirmed ahead of launch Redmi Note 12 series is arriving on October 27 and the brand is building hype around it before the launch.

item.title: The iPhone 14 Pro Review: The Best iPhone Humankind Can Get, Yet!
item.description: The iPhone 14 Pro Review: The Best iPhone Humankind Can Get, Yet!
